hero.subtitle: Create stunning product catalogs with custom QR codes. Share your store instantly with customers and start selling in minutes.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.subtitle: Powerful features to help you showcase and sell your products
features.feature1_desc: Choose from 6 professionally designed templates to showcase your products perfectly.
features.feature2_desc: Generate QR codes instantly for your store. Perfect for print materials and physical locations.
features.feature3_desc: Chat with customers in real-time. AI assistant helps when you are away.
features.feature4_desc: Display prices in both USD and SYP. Automatic conversion with custom rates.
features.feature5_desc: Export products as images and share directly to social media platforms.
features.feature6_desc: Simple, intuitive interface. Get your store online in minutes, not days.

auth.register_subtitle: Start selling and managing your products today
auth.reset_instructions: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
auth.password_reset_success: Password reset successful! Please sign in with your new password.
auth.check_email: Check your email for password reset instructions

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Get your online store up and running in 4 simple steps
how_it_works.step1_desc: Sign up in seconds. No credit card required to get started.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Upload product images, set prices in USD and SYP, add descriptions.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Generate QR codes, export beautiful catalogs, share on social media.
how_it_works.step4_desc: Respond to inquiries in real-time. AI assistant helps when you're busy.
